oeuvres.publication: The potential for justice through tourism
Le rôle potentiel du tourisme en matière de justice
La posibilidad de crear justicia a través del turismo
Combler le fossé entre les chercheurs et les militants

auteur.description: Senior Lecturer, School of Management, University of South Australia

article.titre: Bridging the gap between academic and activist worlds

corps.paragraphe: In 2018, I attended the World Social Forum held in Salvador, Brazil. I joined the WSF with my colleagues from the Tourism Alert and Action Forum where we together advocated for tourism in a context of respect for human rights, social justice and equity. Coming together with activists around the world who are committed to building a better world for all was inspirational. I am an activist-scholar and I work to bridge the academic and activist worlds. This WSF was a pivotal learning moment for me and will influence my work in the future.
